name: Pur3v4d3r Research Article
noteNameFormat: {{published|date:"YYYY"}}-{{"create a 4-6 word kebab-case academic filename capturing the study's main finding or topic"|replace:" ":"-"|lower|safe_name}}

properties.name: aliases
properties.value: {{"Generate 3-4 aliases: the full paper title, a shortened version, key methodology name if applicable, and author-year citation format (e.g., 'Smith et al., 2024'). Return as comma-separated list."|split:", "}}

properties.name: tags
properties.value:
{{"Select 8-12 tags for this research article. Return ONLY comma-separated values:

TYPE: type/literature, type/paper, type/analysis
STATUS: status/not-read
RESEARCH: empirical-research, longitudinal-research, meta-analysis, experimental-psychology, review-paper
DOMAIN (pick 2-3): cognitive-science, cognitive-psychology, neuroscience, learning-science, educational-psychology, behavioral-science, psychometrics, developmental-psychology
METHODS: neuroimaging-studies, behavioral-measures, statistical-analysis, qualitative-research
TOPICS (pick 3-5): memory-systems, working-memory, attention, executive-function, metacognition, cognitive-load, learning-strategies, transfer-of-learning, schema-theory, expertise-development"|split:", "}}

properties.name: link-up
properties.value:
{{"Select the primary MOC based on research domain. Return ONLY the wiki-link:
- [[cognitive-science-moc]]
- [[neuroscience-moc]]
- [[learning-theory-moc]]
- [[educational-psychology-moc]]"}}
